REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Permits the governor to direct the metropolitan transportation authority to provide free transportation to students during a state of emergency
Summary: Permits the governor to direct the metropolitan transportation authority to provide free transportation to students during a state of emergency.
LawCode: Add ยง1266-n, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to permitting the governor to direct the metropolitan transportation authority to provide free transportation to students during a state of emergency
